text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Mobility describes the abilities and any limitations in all aspects of mobility, such as changing position, walking and moving forward, in some cases with the help of an aid.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Mobility v3.3 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Mobility-v3.3(2020EN)).

comment.value:
Please note that on a functional level, zib Mobility references zib MedicalDevice, but in FHIR this direction is reversed. Therefore, the concept MedicalDevice (NL-CM:4.3.4) is mapped on `DeviceUseStatement.reasonReference` in profile [zib-MedicalDevice](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-MedicalDevice) instead of in this profile.
Several concept(s) of zib Mobility are represented using distinct Observation resources. These are grouped using the current resource and are referenced on `Observation.hasMember`:
* Walking (NL-CM:4.3.3): [zib-Mobility.Walking](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.Walking) * ClimbingStairs (NL-CM:4.3.18): [zib-Mobility.ClimbingStairs](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.ClimbingStairs) * ChangingPosition (NL-CM:4.3.8): [zib-Mobility.ChangingPosition](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.ChangingPosition) * MaintainingPosition (NL-CM:4.3.12): [zib-Mobility.MaintainingPosition](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.MaintainingPosition) * Transfer (NL-CM:4.3.5): [zib-Mobility.Transfer](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Mobility.Transfer)
